ref @trusted auto randInPlace(E)(ref E x, E low = E.min, E high = E.max) if (isIntegral!E);
Randomize Contents of , optionally in range [, ].

Randomize Contents of , optional in range [, ].

ref auto randInPlace(T)(ref T x) if (isStaticArray!T);

ref auto randInPlaceBlockwise(B = size_t, A)(ref A x) if (isArray!A && isIntegral!(ElementType!A));
Blockwise Randomize Contents of of Array Type . Randomizes in array blocks of type .

ref auto randInPlace(T)(ref T x) if (is(T == struct));
Randomize Contents of members of .

struct Xoroshiro128plus;
Random Number Generator xoroshiro128+
